isLetter

public boolean isLetter(java.lang.String letter)
helper method that determines whether or not a String is a letter of the alphabet

Parameters:
letter - a String with length of one, which may or may not be a letter
Returns:
true if it is a letter, false otherwise

makeGuess

public boolean makeGuess(java.lang.String guess)
This method is called when the player makes a guess. The guess is added to the list of guessed letters. If it is a bad guess, then the player loses a guess (eg, has one fewer guess remaining).

Parameters:
guess - the letter that is guessed
Returns:
true if it is a good guess, false otherwise
